sections.title: Academy
sections.subtitle: Gaia-X and Ocean Protocol
sections.content: An interactive online education platform to introduce you to the new European Data Economy: Gaia-X, built on Ocean Protocol and DLT.

sections.title: Demonstrators
sections.subtitle: Minimal Viable Gaia-X
sections.content: Experience the new data economy today. We built multiple demonstrators showcasing Gaia-X using DLT.
